title: ImagingEnvironment
description: This element describes the environment in which the biological sample was maintained during the Acquisition of this Image.

subCategoriesOrder.ImagingEnvironment: This element describes the environment in which the biological sample was maintained during the Acquisition of this Image.

ID.description: This is the Unique Identifier of the Environmental Control Device used in this case.

Temperature.description: The field records the Temperature at which this Image Acquisition was performed. Allowed values include a number or the phrase 'Room Temperature'.

CO2Percent.description: The field records the Carbon Dioxide concentration (expressed as a % value) at which this Image Acquisition was performed. Allowed values include a number or the phrase 'Ambient Conditions'.

Humidity.description: The field records the Humidity (expressed as a % value) at which this Image Acquisition was performed. Allowed values include a number or the phrase 'Ambient Humidity'.

AirPressure.description: The field records the AirPressure the Acquisition of this Image was performed at.

O2Percent.description: This field records the Oxygen concentration around the sample [units:none] during the Acquisition of this Image. Expressed as a percentage fraction as a value from 0.0 to 1.0.

Tier.description: The tier level of this component.
